metadata.title: CVE-2024-35837 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:mvpp2: clear BM pool before initialization Register value persist afterbooting the kernel using kexec which results in kernel panic. Thus clearthe BM pool registers before initialisation to fix the issue.
